metadata.title: CVE-2023-25588 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in Binutils. The field `the_bfd` of `asymbol`struct isuninitialized in the `bfd_mach_o_get_synthetic_symtab` function, which maylead to an application crash and local denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-25588` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm1
binutils-multiarch - 2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm1
binutils-source - 2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm1
binutils-static - 2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm1').
